issue.subject: WFS proxified GET requests loose FILTER parameter
issue.description:
WFS proxified GET requests loose FILTER parameter. In PROXY (Java) GetFeatures request in GET method loose FILTER parameter. See log (compare *QueryString* and *RemoteRequest*):
